Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora to sharpish turn. Clay near fine light red-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary 1884-5 (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 163, 4 or 146, 1. Name Soterichos. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0014.07.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0761)
